title: Recovery account
body: I don't how my email address has change, i didnt do anything with that. Now, It's change to some people email. And I dont know what to do know

replies.body:
It's likely your account is compromised. I recommend changing the password to whatever email was previously tied to that account, then submitting a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Select "I need help recovering my account" then fill out as much information as you can recall about the account. Our account specialists will get back you as soon as they've reviewed the information you provided and investigated further. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

1. If you gave your account information to anyone, it may be hacked.

2. If you have forgotten your e-mail or changed it somehow without knowing it can be looked into.

Solution: Send a support ticket to the Riot Account Specialists.
